property.name: mediadisplayblurb
property.value: An Afghan man carrying his daughter and wife on a motorcycle

note.text: At all levels of Afghan society, professional partnerships are based on trusted personal relationships. By learning basic phrases and gestures, and taking an interest in the culture, you will set a foundation for the work you'll do. Your professional expertise may gain you credibility, but building a trusted relationship will be the first step toward mission success.
Remember, leader engagements begin from the moment you greet your counterpart. It's important to set a positive tone by adhering to accepted Afghan ways of showing respect.
